name: Mythical Hero Theseus
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Guiding Ariadne" from your Deck to your hand. During the End Phase: You can shuffle 3 LIGHT monsters from your GY or face-up Extra Deck into the Deck, and if you do, set 1 Counter Trap card from your Deck to your Spell/Trap Zone. You can only use each effect of "Mythical Hero Theseus" once per turn.
pendulum_text: If all monsters you control are LIGHT monsters (min 1.): You can destroy 1 card in your Pendulum Zone, then draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Mythical Hero Theseus" once per turn.
